General.Name: Graphisoft Park SE Real Estate Development European Company Limited
General.Description: Graphisoft Park SE Ingatlanfejleszto Európai Részvénytársaság, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development and management activities in Hungary. The company develops and operates Graphisoft Park that includes 82,000 square meters gross leasable areas of offices, laboratories, educational, and auxiliary facilities. The company is based in Budapest, Hungary.
